Title: Cross-site Scripting
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 1.7.0 before 1.7.9, all versions starting from 1.8.0 before 1.8.5, all versions starting from 1.9.0 before 1.9.7
NotImpacted: All versions before 1.7.0, all versions starting from 1.7.9 before 1.8.0, all versions starting from 1.8.5 before 1.9.0, all versions starting from 1.9.7
